com.redhat.rhn.common.util
Interface ExportWriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
CSVWriter
public interface ExportWriter

ExportWriter - interface that describes the ability to take in a List and reformat it to some other format. You write the list to the ExportWriter with write() and then fetch the contents when you are finished (or while processing) with getContents().

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getContents()
          Get the String version of the values written so far.
 java.lang.String getFileExtension()
          Get the extension of the file to be exported.
 java.lang.String getMimeType()
          Get the mime type of the output

          Set the list of Columns to include in the export.

          Write the List of values to the contents of this Writer.
